info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 12:55PM MDT until July 13 at 1:30PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM MDT FOR SOUTHERN YUMA COUNTY... At 1254 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles northeast of Cope, or 23 miles south of Yuma, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Abarr, Beecher Island, Heartstrong and Vernon. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 226 and 238. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
